CodeBlockMethod.Name: NextLevelMessageX
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.NextLev_X.Enable == true then self.NextLev_X.Enable = false end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if _UserService.LocalPlayer ~= nil then if TriggerBodyEntity.Id == _UserService.LocalPlayer.Id then self:NextLevelMessageX() end end
